resources.string: "I am android developer, i am trying to introduce a different and completely new educational ideas in the career of mobile application development , aims to support developers to achieve the highest degrees of advantage in the career, you can follow me through this links in below. "

"we care about your personal data, so we have prepared this privacy policy to explain how we collect, use and share it.this privacy policy details the personal data revceives about you, how we process it and your rights and obligations in relation to your personal data"
"this privacy policy explain how we collect, use and share your personal data, through the registration process, you will provide us with your name and email."
"when you use the app you can share this app with you friends and this process does not mean that you share the app with data so we care about sharing the app without the data."
نسيت كلمه السر او اريد تغييرها
لدي فكره لتطوير التطبيق,كيف ارسلها لكم؟

string-array.name: field1
string-array.item: إذا دخلت من القائمه الفرعيه علي الاعدادات الخاصه بك ستجد زرار اسمه تغيير كلمه السر-اضغط عليه ستخرج لك شاشه لتغير كلمه السر

string-array.name: field2
string-array.item: لا يوجد هذا الاختيار حاليا ولكن نحن نعمل علي ذالك في التحديثات القادمه

string-array.name: field3
string-array.item: اذا كانت لديك فكره تريد اخبارنا بها, تفضل مشكورا بالتوجه الي زرار اتصل بنا من القائمه الفرعيه تم اكتب فكرتك وارسلها لنا ليتم دراستها
